类 Triangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractShape
      • Triangle
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Comparable<Shape>, Shape

    public class Triangle
extends AbstractShape
    This class represents a Triangle. It defines all the operations mandated by the Shape interface

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 AbstractShape

        reference
